text: Time to replay! Taylor Swift has officially confirmed that, yes, Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds ‘ eldest daughter, James, is on her new Reputation track “ Gorgeous. ” Last month, Swifties speculated that the 2 - year - old was the adorable voice featured in the beginning of the song. In her album booklet, she wrote : “ Baby intro voice by James Reynolds. ” ( The couple are also parents of daughter Ines, 13 months. ) Swift, 27, dropped “ Gorgeous, ” which is the third single off her sixth album, on October 20. The love tune, of course, is about the singer ’ s boyfriend, Joe Alwyn. Swift and Lively, 30, first became fast friends in 2015.
